name: Dragon's Scale
description: The scale of a dragon is rumored to offer protection to its bearer

description: A good luck charm previously owned by a dragon?

description: An old, forgotten amulet.  Boosts power, but at what cost? CURSED

name: Liquid Metal Charm
description: A free flowing blob of metal that is impossible to grasp
